newsitem.title: USA: Bank of N.Y. named Gallaher Group ADR depositary.
newsitem.headline: Bank of N.Y. named Gallaher Group ADR depositary.

text.p: Bank of New York Co Inc said Friday it has been selected by Gallaher Group Plc to be its depositary for the company's American Depositary Receipt program.

The ADRs of Gallaher, the newly spun-off unit of American Brands Inc started trading today on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol GLH.N. American Brands is changing its name following the spinoff to Fortune Brands Inc. Gallaher, whose brands include Benson & Hedges and Silk Cut cigarettes, is the leader in the cigarette, cigar and pipe tobacco product markets in the United Kingdom.
